name: Bliss (itch) (QuicksilverSashGames)
description:
Thank you for checking our game out!

Bliss is an Action game being developed by 2 people.  Bliss is placed in a fantasy world infested of mythical creatures taking over the world. Your quest is to slay them all with different weapons and combos as you explore the universe of Bliss.

You can check our  YouTube and Discord for progress updates!

Pre alpha [V 0.18 ]

This is a test build we did for you to mostly try out the combat system we have developed.  Particle Effects and Sound Effects are still in the works and not active. There is still plenty of polish for the game but we believe to have a strong base now.

Take this short survey to help us improve Bliss! https://forms.gle/ijqTCt3s9zs9Fk9J8


Planned release date: February 2021
